body:
Name who and why this player on the server is your idol :)

Me its KooDaLord, cause he inspires me when I build and hes a fun dood to talk to, (when hes on XD,(Koo is quite slow at answering Skype messages), I never ever got mad at him :)  

Fun Fact: He forced me to build a castle on Akane, no food, no water, no sleep, I almost died :0

Hes so sexy too, no homo

replies.body:
The player who inspires me the most would probably be yoav or Howsie, the pony himeself.
Yoav has always been a leader to me, whether that's organizing the Sistahood... or helping other users get through the tough times.
Howsie as inspired me to love ponies. He transformed me into a Brony :D 
In all seriousness, Howsie has given me feedback on how I moderate! Both of these people are just top blokes.

replies.body:
For me, there is a difference between Idol and role model, I have a different person for these two situations.

For my role model, it has to be jozz, its just HAS to be.
Back in the day, this guy looked up to ME, I was astonished, why would anyone do that xD. He always made me feel like I did something RIGHT with my life. And after so long, he has become better than me at everything. Literally. That includes his passion.....


But for my idol, it has to be eric. He didnt give me permission to say much about what we talk about, but I will say this, he may seem like just another great pvp'er and friend, but he is much more. After spending almost 2 months straight talking to eric, I learned so much about him and what he is going through. And to be honest, I feel really connected with eric, with every problem I have eric and jozz are always there for me.
Eric may not want to show his other half, but this guy can really pack some love....I can tell you this for a FACT.

replies.body:
FightToWin(Numbers go here xD)

JUBBINATOR

Storm977 (are those the right numbers? xD)

Howsie22

I picked them because,

On the first day MC Zone got the multiplayer hub (not the small stone one), I remember see FTW and me, being a 9 year old, fan-boyed him and asked for a screenshot with him. Considering he was AWESOME, he agreed. The suddenly, JUBB, Storm, and Howsie got on. 

My mind = BLOWN.
